title: Amumu Vs Sejunai
body: These Junglers are very similar which is better?

replies.body: The one that lands their ult first?
Sejuani can counter Amumu if she lands her ult second. Negating Amumu's ult.

Couldn't Mumu do similar so long as he can get into position with his Q to do so?

They're both great and, to me, it ultimately comes down to which you play better.

He can't do it during Sejuani's ult since hers stuns and doesn't root.

Sejuani can just wait in Amumu's ult for his team to get near and mass stun them.
They both have about the same reward to playing well, but amumu has a lot more risk.

> They both have about the same reward to playing well, but amumu has a lot more risk.

Prob is, they dont^ Amu need to camp bursty lanes, seju can gank any lane ( PRE 6)

> [{quoted}](name=Malevolentslim,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=90lg2xGp,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-22T04:24:37.559+0000)
>
 ang gitting gud.

http://www.lolking.net/search?name=Malevolentslim  http://www.lolking.net/search?name=minizav , lets compare?

Also, having a shitty pre 6/ult requirement really hurts at higher elo.

Amummu ganks are more lethal than Sejuani but depends if he lands his Q, Sejuani have his Q and his E to cause CC so no depnds of one skill to gank, Amummu deals more damage and its a better fighter than her because can reduce damage and shred mr, Sejuani have better mobility, better tools to positioning and a completly AoE cc kit that turns her in better "team fighter" than the mummy, but not for much, Amummu have better clears but its more vulnerability to counter gank than her, So both are a good junglers, I love Sejuani, its my main champ since ends of season 3 but now that she is a perma ban I use Amummu, Skarner and Gragas like vice Sejuani, and feels comfortable, obviusly I want her "lesser ban" but its  very difficult.
Amumu is my preferred character, because he does better with an AP build, but Sejuani is probably stronger as a pure CC Tanky Monstrosity.

Amumu has better clear, but is more vulnerable in the jungle.

Sejuani has better pre-6 ganks, but her ult can be "unreliable". (Since these last patch changes.)

I wouldn't say just yet that Sej is strictly better. But Amumu's ult is a bit worse if you are losing compared to Sej's
realistically it's probably sejuani, but I am better and more comfortable with amumu. I think they are close enough that it is mostly player choice.

Sejuani is "better" imo because she's far more reliable. She can throw herself into the enemy team without landing a skillshot, which positions her just as effective ultimate.

Yeah, you can argue that Amumu is stronger for certain situations, but if we're talking about competitive value, reliability tends to win in the end from what I've seen.
